law.catch_line: The transportation element may include all types of:...

text.section:
The transportation element shall:
propose, on a schedule that extends as far into the future as is reasonable, the most appropriate and desirable patterns for:
the general location, character, and extent of channels, routes, and terminals for transportation facilities; and
the circulation of individuals and goods;
provide for bicycle and pedestrian access and travelways; and
include an estimate of the use of any proposed improvement.
